Generation VIII.Sword: It barely moves, but it's still alive. Hiding in its shell without food or water seems to have awakened its psychic powers.
Generation VIII.Shield: As it grows inside its shell, it uses its psychic abilities to monitor the outside world and prepare for evolution.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 5 , Giant's Cap , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness Bridge Field , Dappled Grove , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 5 , Giant's Cap , Giant's Mirror , Stony Wilderness Bridge Field , Dappled Grove , Rolling Fields , South Lake Miloch ( Max Raid Battle )
